document_data.name: ''Shield of the Maimed God''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Shield of the Maimed God''''' was a [[divine]]ly [[enchanted]] [[tower shield]] that belonged to [[Charissa Maernos]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The ''Shield of the Maimed God'' was a sturdy and well-balanced heavy shield. Its edges were engraved with Tyr's holy runes. These mysterious symbols radiated divine protection.
document_data.Powers: This tower shield possessed a ''+1'' enchantment to its already significant defensive properties.
document_data.History: In [[1374 DR]], Charissa Maernos wielded the ''Shield of the Maimed God'' during her pursuit of vengeance agains the [[Night Masks]] of [[Westgate]] who were responsible for her family's downfall.
